titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-505, by Mr. Reynolds.
Provides that on the legislative day of March 8, 2000, it shall be in order for the Speaker to entertain motions to suspend the rules.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 170.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 425.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/29/2000--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on March 8, 2000, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
